name: X.P10 Demo
description:
This is a build of the debug room in the game. Nothing is final. I'm aiming to release the full game before Summer. Hopefully, sooner rather than later.

I highly recommend using a gamepad. 

Move with the arrow or wsad keys. (Gamepad: Left stick)

Jump with x (Gamepad: A)

Shoot a seed with z (Gamepad: X)

Ring your bell with space (Gamepad: Y)

To attack enemies, shoot a seed at them, and after you hit them, ring your bell to make them explode.

 The boss was supposed to work by making an enemy explode next to them to do damage, but it was too buggy, and since neither would be in the final game at all, I didn't think it was worth the effort. Sorry about that lol.

Also, that black thing is invincible, just run.
